text:
Noodle.ai | Senior UI Engineer | San Francisco or Palo Alto, CA | Full-time | Onsite

We’re looking for people with a love for UI and visualization to join our team. We design and build apps for industrial and enterprise customers that make complex data science output intuitive and interactive. Our stack is heavily React and D3 based; this is a chance to work on innovative bespoke creative visualization ideas in a field full of potential.

https://noodle.ai/current-openings?gh_jid=610553 I lead the Design Technology team at Noodle. If you’re interested, email me directly at joe.golike@noodle.ai.
